title: Power Generator
contents: Power is generated by Power Generators that are fed by Oil Derricks.
Each Power Generator uses up to 4 Oil Derricks. So, for example, if you have 10 Oil Derricks you would need 3 Power Generators to utilize all of the oil derricks and generate maximum Power.
While oil derricks must be built on oil resources, Power Generators can be built anywhere on the map. But keep in mind: additional generators beyond one for every 4 derricks will provide no benefit.
